tweet: The closure of the Atlantic City Rail line by @NJTRANSIT is affecting so many throughout South Jersey and these delays are unacceptable.

The failure of @NJTRANSIT on the AC Rail line is disturbing. I caught up with some people today in the halls of Congress to talk about this failure and how I am going to fight my hardest to get it straightened out. #NewJersey #AtlanticCity #SouthJersey https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UO4M4mcyG1Y&feature=youtu.be …
This morning on the house floor I addressed Members of Congress about the need to restore faith in our institution and prevent future shutdowns. https://youtu.be/hWGnq5dpMRM

I have fought to protect the lifeblood of the local economy - tourism, fisheries, and wildlife-viewing – by banning offshore oil and gas drilling at the state level, and I will continue to do so at the federal level.

I am proud to be appointed to be the House Committee on Natural Resources. South Jersey is rich with natural resources, and in the 2nd Congressional District, the coastal economy and our commercial and recreational fisheries are a large part of life. https://vandrew.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-jeff-van-drew-nj-2-strong-advocate-fisherman-appointed-house …

“35 days is too long. Any amount of time is too long. Both parties must come together to do the responsible thing for the American people." - JVD https://vandrew.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-jeff-van-drew-nj-2-introduces-bipartisan-bill-prevent-future …

“It feels like South Jersey is getting the short end of the stick and I will not tolerate this. I am immediately going to call New Jersey Transit and find out what the hell is going on and respond accordingly,” - JVD https://vandrew.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-van-drew-incensed-news-5-month-delay-atlantic-city-rail-line-fix …

This was in reference to the bill I proposed to fund our Coast Guard. As in be a good American and fund our Coast Guard.
"It's more important, not to be a good Republican or to be a good Democrat, but to be a good American." - Jeff Van Drew https://twitter.com/VeronicaDudo/status/1085651220860006402 …

It is unacceptable for the men and women who protect us to be treated like second class citizens over partisan bickering. We need to re-open our government. We need to separate these issues. https://connectingvets.radio.com/articles/jeff-van-drew-calls-passage-pay-our-coast-guard-parity-act …
I am urging my fellow Congresspeople to support our Coast Guard and support our funding. #PayOurCoastGuardAct
The Coast Guard Training Center and FAA William J Hughes Technical Center are two of South Jersey's biggest employers.

In South Jersey alone, more than 1,500 brave men and women in the Coast Guard have been affected by the shutdown. The number approaches 1 million Coast Guard members and federal workers nationwide. #PayOurCoastGuardAct

Today I addressed the House floor to gain support for the "Pay Our Coast Guard Act" and legislation to fund the FAA during the government shutdown. #PayOurCoastGuardAct https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QfcInrA_H-U&feature=youtu.be …

I will be addressing the house floor today around 12 PM EST to urge members to immediately bring my bill H.R.350 the "Fund Our Coast Guard Act" to vote. You can watch the house floor live here:  https://www.c-span.org/video/?456929-2/house-session … #PayTheCoastGuard

Today I met with Master Chief Jason M. Vanderhaden and Admiral Karl Schultz to discuss the shutdown and its effects on the Coast Guard as well as the legislation I introduced to fund the Coast Guard during the shutdown. pic.twitter.com/9qdu0EuKWb
It is essential to our nations safety and security and the well-being of many families in South Jersey and across the United States. #FAA #CoastGuard #StopTheShutdown

I wrote a letter to @SpeakerPelosi and @senatemajldr urging them to support the Coast Guard and Federal Aviation Administration(FAA) by supporting the bills I introduced to re-open them. #CoastGuard #FAA pic.twitter.com/g00wWnLZis
We must come together to end it. #GovtShutdown #NJ02

South Jersey needs the folks at our Coast Guard Training Center in Cape May, the Coast Guard Air Station in AC, and the FAA's William J. Hughes Technical Center in EHT to get back to work for the safety and security of our nation. #CoastGuard #FAA #GovtShutdown #NJ02
We need to separate these issues. We can address the border crisis without this shutdown and the distressing effects it is having on South Jersey and the United States of America.
It is unacceptable for the men and women who protect us to be treated like second class citizens over partisan bickering. We need to re-open our government. This is shameful.

In my first full week as a Congressman, I introduced legislation to fund the Coast Guard and Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) during the Government shutdown. https://vandrew.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-jeff-van-drew-introduces-legislation-fund-coast-guard-and-federal …
Democrat or Republican, we are all Americans.
